hero.title: KGH: Cultivating the Future with Carbon
hero.subtitle: Zero-Waste Completion, Smart Farm
hero.description: A decarbonization solution that utilizes all byproducts from biogas plants to produce high-value crops and oxygen.

co2.title: CO₂ (Carbon Dioxide) Supply
co2.description: CO₂ captured from hydrogen reforming processes becomes the 'growth accelerator' for our smart farm.

heat.title: Heat Supply
heat.description: Waste heat generated during hydrogen production is reused as 'heating energy' for the smart farm.

fertilizer.title: Bio Fertilizer Supply
fertilizer.description: Final cake remaining after sludge treatment is supplied as 'eco-friendly organic fertilizer'.

water.title: Water Supply
water.description: Wastewater from processes undergoes advanced treatment (Anammox, etc.) to be reborn as 'clean agricultural water'.

productivity.title: Productivity Maximization
productivity.co2Concentration: Maintaining 2x higher CO₂ concentration of 800-1,000PPM compared to normal atmosphere (400PPM)
productivity.result: Plant growth acceleration, 2x increase in harvest yield

quality.title: High-Quality Produce
quality.description: Cultivating high-value crops like strawberries and tomatoes using eco-friendly fertilizer and clean water

oxygen.title: Oxygen Production
oxygen.description: Carbon consumption + 1mol of oxygen (O₂) production per 1mol of CO₂

summary.title: KGH Smart Farm is the completion of the 'Waste-to-Resource' model and a core solution accelerating 'Net-Zero 2050'.
